experience.title: Full Stack Engineer
experience.description: Contributed to the development of complex JavaScript and C# applications with the goal of creating a a wold-class product.
descriptionItems: Built, maintained back-end and back-end application to continue supporting growth of the company
Contributed to key strategic integrations to with third party partners for application processing

experience.title: Full Stack Developer
experience.description: Contributed to product development, product enhancement and bug fixing of the front-end and back-end using the  Linux, Apache, MySQL, and PHP Stack, React, AWS and Rackspace.
descriptionItems: Built, maintained and deployed the front-end of new sites to collect leads (Solar, Refinance, Tax)
Created complex SQL scripts to provide clients and team member with data not available in reporting platform
Experienced in integrating of client APIs

experience.title: Front End Developer
experience.description: Built and maintained a React with Redux based front-end user interface for an internal loss (theft) prevention web application to centralize theft cases at all Jons locations by taking a paper-based process and moving it fully online.
descriptionItems: Created customized views based on role access provided though single sign on credentials
Styled the application by using Bootstrap and created forms using Redux-Form

experience.title: Solutions Specialist
experience.description: Built, deployed and maintained 6 customer experience survey programs that collect and report data to drive business decisions for Fortune 500 Companies. Some of my greatest accomplishments include:
descriptionItems: Created customized email and SMS targeted web-based surveys using HTML, CSS and JavaScript
Created a JavaScript tool to dynamically clean out profanity in comments before displaying in reporting
Identified operational issues with online purchases and provided metrics to drive changes in the online retail process

Increased volume of customer reviews on a retailers’ web page 40% by integrating customer experience surveys with the Bazaarvoice platform and directly driving traffic to the platform through an opt in process to leave an additional product/service review

about.aboutme: I am a Full Stack Engineer with a background in electrical engineering. I have over 4 years of experience designing, building and maintaining large customer experience programs for Fortune 500 companies. My strengths include teamwork, effective communication, and problem solving. I especially enjoy learning new technologies and working on personal projects. You can find some of these projects below. I am open to opportunies where I can continue to develop professionally.

projectSnapshots.name: Snappy
projectSnapshots.info: A web app that creates targeted email surveys with an authenticated account and credit based campaigns.

projectSnapshots.name: Fruitdrop
projectSnapshots.info: A site for communities to share home grown fruits and vegetables in order to prevent food waste.

projectSnapshots.name: Crypto Bracket
projectSnapshots.info: Crypto Bracket is a tool for crypto currency tracking.

projectSnapshots.name: Mongo News
projectSnapshots.info: A web app that pulls article headlines and links to save or review.

projectSnapshots.name: Trivia Game
projectSnapshots.info: A time based trivia game that focuses on content from Pixar movies.

projectSnapshots.name: Hangman
projectSnapshots.info: Here is my spin on Hangman. I have chosen a space theme for my version.

projects.name: Snappy
projects.info: A web app that creates targeted email surveys. Quick and simple interface allows you to create and send surveys to any list people/customers. Sign up today and send out your first survey in under 10 minutes.

projects.name: Fruitdrop
projects.info: Fruit Drop is a community for home growers who want to share and trade their fruit and produce. This allows everyone in your neighborhoods to benefit from one another and get fresh, organic produce.

projects.name: Crypto Bracket
projects.info: Crypto Bracket is a tool that allows crypto currency investors to: Lookup current and historical coin prices, view a portfolio dashboard, as well as transaction details, and Track gains and losses and tax basis by transaction

projects.name: Mongo News
projects.info: A web app that pulls data article headlines from Techcrunch, Hackernews(YCombinator) and hackernoon. Articles can then be saved within the application and notes can be added to each saved article.

projects.name: Trivia Game
projects.info: A time based trivia game that focuses on content from Pixar movies. Put your knowledge of Pixar trivia to the test and you might learn a couple of new facts. There are 20 randomized questions, each timed for 10 seconds.

projects.name: Hangman
projects.info: Here is my spin on Hangman. I have chosen a space theme for my version. Test your hangman skills and knowledge of astronomy terms. There are a total of 10 randomized words.
